com.zcking.furyengine.engine

Class WindowSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings

  • public class WindowSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Fluent API for configuring Window instances. Wraps all the window settings for an simple configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WindowSettings create()
      Creates a new, default window settings instance, which you can then configure using the fluent interface.

      WindowSettings withAlphaEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Should the alpha channel be enabled for this window, to support rendering of transparencies?
      WindowSettings withClearColor(org.joml.Vector4f clearColor)
      Specify the clear color for the window; this is the color to display where nothing is rendered.
      WindowSettings withCullFace(int cullFace)
      Specify the face to cull, if culling is enabled.

      Should culling be enabled for this window?

      Enable one OpenGL target for further OpenGL configuration.
      WindowSettings withGlEnableTargets(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> enableTargets)
      Enable one or more OpenGL targets for further OpenGL configuration.
      WindowSettings withGlfwContextVersionMajor(int version)
      Change the major version of the GLFW context that is used.

      Change the minor version of the GLFW context that is used.

      The initial height for the window.

      Should the window be visible upon creation?

      The text to display on the window's title bar.

      The initial width for the window.

      Whether or not the window's OpenGL context should support forward compatibility.
      WindowSettings withOpenGLProfile(int profile)
      Generic OpenGL profile setter for the window.
      WindowSettings withResizable(boolean resizable)
      Should the window be able to be resized or not?
      WindowSettings withShowPolygons(boolean showPolygons)
      Should the window's rendering display the polygon outlines? Mainly used for debugging.
      WindowSettings withStartCentered(boolean startCentered)
      Should the window be centered in the display upon creation?
      WindowSettings withStartMaximized(boolean startMaximized)
      Should the window be maximized upon creation?
      WindowSettings withVSyncEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Should V-Sync be enabled for this window? Enabling this ensures the display refreshes at a rate that the monitor can handle.

        Creates a new, default window settings instance, which you can then configure using the fluent interface.
